【考法 1】 vt. 威吓： "to frighten"
【例】 refused to be intimidated by the manager 对经理的恐吓不为所动
【近】 browbeat, bully, coerce, cow, frighten, hector, terrify
【反】 blandish, cajole, coax 用花言巧语讨好
【派】 intimidation n. 恐吓
【另】 timid 胆小的, 羞怯的
from Latin in- "in" (see in- (2)) + timidus "fearful"
in-: prefix meaning "not, opposite of, without" (also im-, il-, ir- by assimilation of -n- with following consonant), from Latin in- "not,"
